name: 安吉丽克·普雷托瑞斯
name_full: 安吉丽克·普雷托瑞斯 Angelique Pretorius
introduction: London-born, South African actress Angelique Pretorius started her acting journey with classical theatre training, but shifted her focus from stage to screen to become a prominent actress in TV and film. While renowned in South Africa, Pretorius is now becoming recognized internationally with her performance opposite Jennifer Hudson in the biopic 'Winnie Mandela'; with recurring roles in Starz series 'Black Sails' and HBO series 'Strike Back' respectively and her role opposite Sir Derek Jacobi in the acclaimed Canadian movie 'Diamonds'. She has also received numerous accolades, ranging from acting awards to being voted into SA's 'FHM 100 Sexiest Women in the World' list.
